message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think it would be very valuable to you and I'm excited to see what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position on wanting to keep expenses low, but I'm confident this product is worth the investment. Would you consider meeting in the middle at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $87?
